name: m1-dp-serratore-suck-vautrin
main: concurrently  -c "auto"  --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail "cd backend && npm run start" "cd frontend && npm run start"

scripts.postinstall: concurrently -c "auto" "cd frontend && npm install" "cd backend && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently -c "auto" --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -c "auto"  --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail "cd backend && npm run start" "cd frontend && npm run start"

author: Alexandre Serratore, Hugo Suck, Guillaume Vautrin
